1 //ROS-OpenCV Tools for Image Manipulation
2 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
3 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
4 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
15 #include "path_generation.h"
16 namespace enc = sensor_msgs::image_encodings;
17 
18 static const double SCALE = 3.0;
19 static const double K = 2.0;
20 static const double KI = pow(K, -1);
21 static const double MAX_SPEED = 0.5;
22 static const double STEERING_SPEED = 0.2;
23 static const double ANGLE_TOLERANCE = 0.087;
24 static const double DIST_TOLERANCE = 0.1;
25 static const double LASER_LIMIT = 0.2;
26 static const double RAD_ROBOT = 0.2;
27 static const double LASER_UPPER_LIMIT = 1.5;
28 
35 PathGeneration::PathGeneration(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh), it_(nh)
36 {
37  sub1_ = nh_.subscribe("robot_0/odom", 1000, &PathGeneration::odomCallBack, this); // get robot odom
38  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh); // transport imahe
39  sub3_ = it.subscribe("map_image/full", 1, &PathGeneration::imageCallBack, this); // get map image
40  sub4_ = nh_.subscribe("robot_0/base_scan", 10, &PathGeneration::laserCallBack, this); // receive laser scan
41  sub2_ = nh_.subscribe("path", 10, &PathGeneration::pathCallBack, this); // receive path
42  image_pub_ = it_.advertise("map_image/path_following", 1); //publish on RQT
43  cmd_vel_pub_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("robot_0/cmd_vel", 1); //publish control of velocities
44  //Below get's parameters from parameter server
45  nh_.getParam("/local_map/map_resolution", resolution_);
46  nh_.getParam("/local_map/map_width", mapSize_);
47 
48  // We store information allowing to convert from global to local
49  pathArrayGen_.received = false; // get path status
50  pathArrayGen_.mapSize = mapSize_; // get map size
51  pathArrayGen_.resolution = resolution_; // get image resolution
52 
53  ros::NodeHandle pn("~");
54  pn.param<bool>("purePursuit", purePursuit, false); // get node parameter to pure pursuit
55 }
56 
61 PathGeneration::~PathGeneration()
62 {
63  cv::destroyWindow("Recieved Path");
64 }
65 
71 void PathGeneration::pathCallBack(const geometry_msgs::PoseArrayConstPtr &msg)
72 {
73  ROS_INFO("NEW PATH RECIEVED");
74  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Recieved Path has " << msg->poses.size() << " points");
75  // reset parameters
76  pathArrayGen_.mtx.lock();
77  pathArrayGen_.poses.poses.clear();
78  position_target_.clear();
79  target_angle_.clear();
80  position_tracker_.clear();
81  reached_target_ = false;
82  index_ = 0;
83  readjust_ = false;
84 
85  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg->poses.size(); i++)
86  {
87  pathArrayGen_.poses.poses.push_back(msg->poses.at(i));
88  }
89  pathArrayGen_.received = true;
90  pathArrayGen_.mtx.unlock();
91 }
97 void PathGeneration::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg)
98 {
99  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = msg->pose.pose; // get robot poses
100  pathArrayGen_.mtx.lock();
101  pathArrayGen_.robot_pose = pose;
102  pathArrayGen_.mtx.unlock();
103 }
109 void PathGeneration::imageCallBack(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr &msg)
110 {
111  try
112  {
113  if (enc::isColor(msg->encoding))
114  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::BGR8);
115  else
116  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::MONO8);
117  }
118  catch (cv_bridge::Exception &e)
119  {
120  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
121  return;
122  }
123 
124  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.lock();
125  imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.push_back(cvPtr_->image);
126 
127  if ((cvPtr_->image.cols != 200) || (cvPtr_->image.rows != 200))
128  {
129  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(60, "The image is not 200 x 200 what has gone wrong!");
130  }
131  imageDataRecieved_.timeStampDeque_.push_back(msg->header.stamp);
132 
133  if (imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.size() > 2)
134  {
135  imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.pop_front(); // avoid overstack of images
136  imageDataRecieved_.timeStampDeque_.pop_front(); // avoid overstack of timers
137  }
138  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.unlock();
139 }
140 
146 void PathGeneration::laserCallBack(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr &msg)
147 {
148  obstacle_detected_ = obstacleDetection_.detectObtacle(msg); // get parameter of obstacle detection
149  laser_readings_ = obstacleDetection_.getLaserReading(msg); // get laser reading
150 }
151 
156 void PathGeneration::printPath()
157 {
158  ros::Time timeImage = ros::Time::now();
159  cv::Mat image;
160 
161  while (ros::ok())
162  {
163  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.lock();
164  if (imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.size() > 0)
165  {
166  image = imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.front();
167  timeImage = imageDataRecieved_.timeStampDeque_.front();
168  }
169  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.unlock();
170 
171  if (!image.empty())
172  {
173  cv_bridge::CvImage cv_image;
174  cv::cvtColor(image, cv_image.image, CV_GRAY2RGB);
175  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < position_tracker_.size(); i++)
176  {
177  // adjust data from global to pixels
178  double offset = (mapSize_) / 2;
179  auto x_target = ((position_tracker_.at(i).first - pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x) / resolution_) + offset;
180  auto y_target = (-(position_tracker_.at(i).second - pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y) / resolution_) + offset;
181 
182  if (i == index_)
183  {
184  cv::Point org(100, 100);
185  cv::Point pt(x_target, y_target);
186  cv::circle(cv_image.image, pt, 3, CV_RGB(0, 255, 0), -1); // draw green point
187  imageProcessing_.setImage(image);
188 
189  // check if it can connect the robot with the target point
190  valid_target_ = imageProcessing_.checkConnectivity(org, pt);
191  if (!valid_target_)
192  {
193  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Invalid Point " << index_ << " located in Occupied Space. Point " << index_ << " ignored.");
194  position_target_.pop_front();
195  position_tracker_.pop_front();
196  }
197  }
198  else if (i < index_)
199  {
200  cv::Point pt(x_target, y_target);
201  cv::circle(cv_image.image, pt, 3, CV_RGB(0, 0, 255), -1); // draw blue points
202  }
203  else
204  {
205  cv::Point pt(x_target, y_target);
206  cv::circle(cv_image.image, pt, 3, CV_RGB(255, 0, 0), -1); // draw red points
207  }
208 
209  cv::Point robot((image.cols / 2), (image.rows / 2));
210  cv::circle(cv_image.image, robot, 3, CV_RGB(255, 0, 255), -1); // draw robot position
211  }
212 
213  cv_image.encoding = "bgr8";
214  cv_image.header = std_msgs::Header();
215  image_pub_.publish(cv_image.toImageMsg());
216  }
217  }
218 }
219 
224 void PathGeneration::navigation()
225 {
226  while (ros::ok())
227  {
228  while (position_target_.size() > 0 && valid_target_)
229  {
230  //get navigation parameters
231  robot_yaw = tf::getYaw(pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.orientation);
232  double x_dist = (position_target_.front().first - pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x);
233  double y_dist = (position_target_.front().second - pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y);
234  double angle = atan2(y_dist, x_dist);
235  double linear_dist = sqrt((pow(x_dist, 2)) + (pow(y_dist, 2)));
236  double gamma = 2 * x_dist / pow(linear_dist, 2);
237  target_angle_.push_back((angle - robot_yaw));
238  double gain = (SCALE * fabs(target_angle_.front())) / (2 * M_PI);
239  //check if robot reached the target
240  if (!reached_target_)
241  {
242  //checkif pure pursuit was passed.
243  if (!purePursuit)
244  {
245  if ((target_angle_.back()) > ANGLE_TOLERANCE)
246  {
247  control_.linear.x = 0;
248  control_.angular.z = STEERING_SPEED;
249  reached_target_ = false;
250  }
251  else if ((target_angle_.back()) < -ANGLE_TOLERANCE)
252  {
253  control_.linear.x = 0;
254  control_.angular.z = -STEERING_SPEED;
255  reached_target_ = false;
256  }
257 
258  else if (((pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x <= position_target_.front().first + DIST_TOLERANCE) && (pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y <= position_target_.front().second + DIST_TOLERANCE)) &&
259  ((pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x >= position_target_.front().first - DIST_TOLERANCE) && (pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y >= position_target_.front().second - DIST_TOLERANCE)))
260  {
261  control_.linear.x = 0;
262  control_.angular.z = 0;
263 
264  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" robot Position [x,y]= [ " << pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x << " ] , [ " << pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y << " ]");
265  reached_target_ = true;
266  }
267  else
268  {
269 
270  double vel = KI * linear_dist;
271  double angular_vel = K * target_angle_.back();
272  control_.linear.x = KI * vel;
273  control_.angular.z = angular_vel;
274  if (vel > MAX_SPEED)
275  {
276  control_.linear.x = MAX_SPEED;
277  }
278  else if (angular_vel > MAX_SPEED)
279  {
280  angular_vel = MAX_SPEED;
281  }
282  }
283  }
284  else if (purePursuit)
285  {
286  reached_target_ = false;
287  control_.angular.z = sqrt(gain * fabs(gamma));
288  if ((target_angle_.back()) < 0)
289  {
290  control_.angular.z = -control_.angular.z;
291  }
292 
293  control_.linear.x = fabs(control_.angular.z / gamma) * (1 / gain);
294  if (((pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x <= position_target_.front().first + DIST_TOLERANCE) && (pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y <= position_target_.front().second + DIST_TOLERANCE)) &&
295  ((pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x >= position_target_.front().first - DIST_TOLERANCE) && (pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y >= position_target_.front().second - DIST_TOLERANCE)))
296  {
297  control_.linear.x = 0;
298  control_.angular.z = 0;
299 
300  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" robot Position [x,y]= [ " << pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x << " ] , [ " << pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y << " ]");
301  reached_target_ = true;
302  }
303  }
304  }
305  if (reached_target_)
306  {
307  position_target_.pop_front();
308  target_angle_.clear();
309  index_++;
310  reached_target_ = false;
311  }
312  //check if obstacles are detected with the laser
313  if (!obstacle_detected_)
314  {
315  control_.linear.x = 0;
316  control_.angular.z = 0;
317  position_target_.pop_front();
318  target_angle_.clear();
319  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Laser Reading " << laser_readings_);
320  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Obstacle Detected ,Target Invalid, Moving to next point");
321  readjust_ = true;
322  if (position_target_.size() == 0)
323  {
324  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Invalid Path, Enter new Parameters");
325  readjust_ = true;
326  }
327  //readjust robot position if obtacle is detected
328  if (laser_readings_ <= LASER_LIMIT + RAD_ROBOT && laser_readings_ < LASER_UPPER_LIMIT && readjust_)
329  {
330  control_.linear.x = -MAX_SPEED;
331  }
332  else if (laser_readings_ > LASER_LIMIT + RAD_ROBOT && laser_readings_ > LASER_UPPER_LIMIT)
333  {
334  readjust_ = false;
335  }
336  }
337 
338  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(control_);
339  }
340  }
341 }
342 
347 void PathGeneration::receivedPath()
348 {
349  ros::Time timeImage = ros::Time::now();
350  cv::Mat image;
351  count_ = 0;
352  cv::namedWindow("Received Path", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL);
353  cv::waitKey(50);
354  while (ros::ok())
355  {
356  //process received Data
357  bool imageOk = false;
358  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.lock();
359  if (imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.size() > 0)
360  {
361  image = imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.front();
362  timeImage = imageDataRecieved_.timeStampDeque_.front();
363  imageDataRecieved_.imageDeque_.pop_front();
364  imageDataRecieved_.timeStampDeque_.pop_front();
365  imageOk = true;
366  }
367  imageDataRecieved_.mtx.unlock();
368 
369  if (imageOk)
370  {
371 
372  if (pathArrayGen_.received)
373  {
374  ROS_INFO("New Path Recieved");
375  cv::Mat RGB_IMage;
376  cv::cvtColor(image, RGB_IMage, CV_GRAY2RGB);
377  pathArrayGen_.mtx.lock();
378  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pathArrayGen_.poses.poses.size(); i++)
379  {
380  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = pathArrayGen_.poses.poses.at(i);
381  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" Element on Path " << i);
382  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" Local Position [x,y]= [ " << pose.position.x << " ] , [ " << pose.position.y << " ]");
383  //convert locations and draw points without processing
384  double offset = (pathArrayGen_.mapSize * pathArrayGen_.resolution) / 2;
385  double x_position_image = pose.position.x;
386  double y_position_image = -pose.position.y;
387  double x_position = pose.position.x + pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.x;
388  double y_position = pose.position.y + pathArrayGen_.robot_pose.position.y;
389  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" Localized position [x,y]: [ " << x_position << " ],[ " << y_position << " ]");
390  double target_x = (x_position);
391  double target_y = (y_position);
392  position_target_.push_back(std::make_pair(target_x, target_y));
393  position_tracker_.push_back(std::make_pair(target_x, target_y));
394 
395  double xD = (x_position_image + offset) / pathArrayGen_.resolution;
396  double yD = (y_position_image + offset) / pathArrayGen_.resolution;
397  ROS_INFO_STREAM(" Target " << i << " position [" << target_x << ", " << target_y << "]");
398 
399  cv::circle(RGB_IMage, cv::Point((xD), (yD)), 3, CV_RGB(255, 0, 0), -1);
400  }
401  pathArrayGen_.poses.poses.clear();
402  pathArrayGen_.received = false;
403  pathArrayGen_.mtx.unlock();
404  cv::putText(RGB_IMage, "Received Raw Path", cv::Point(30, 30),
405  cv::FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX_SMALL, 0.5, CV_RGB(200, 200, 250), 1, CV_AA);
406  cv::imshow("Received Path", RGB_IMage);
407  }
408  cv::waitKey(5);
409  }
410 
411  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(50));
412  }
413 
414  std::cout << __func__ << " thread terminated" << std::endl;
415 }
